business_config.business_tagline: Protecting what matters most with personalized care
business_config.business_description: A leading Silicon Valley-based insurance provider offering innovative and comprehensive insurance solutions with a human touch
business_config.assistant_personality: friendly, proactive, conversational, empathetic, trustworthy, knowledgeable

voice_config.welcome_message: Hi there! I'm your friendly Acme Insurance assistant. I'd love to help you find the perfect coverage for your needs. Do you mind if I ask you a few questions to get started?

auto.name: Basic Coverage
auto.description: Essential liability protection for budget-conscious drivers
auto.coverage_details: Meets state minimum requirements for liability

auto.name: Standard Coverage
auto.description: Balanced protection with liability and some vehicle coverage
auto.coverage_details: Includes liability, collision with deductible, roadside assistance

auto.name: Premium Protection
auto.description: Comprehensive protection for your vehicle and liability needs
auto.coverage_details: Full coverage with lower deductibles, rental car reimbursement

auto.name: Full Comprehensive
auto.description: Maximum protection for high-value vehicles and complete peace of mind
auto.coverage_details: Everything in Premium plus gap insurance, new car replacement, vanishing deductible

home.name: Essential Protection
home.description: Basic coverage for homeowners on a budget
home.coverage_details: Dwelling coverage, basic liability, limited personal property

home.name: Home Shield
home.coverage_details: Enhanced dwelling coverage, increased liability, standard personal property

home.name: Premium Home Care
home.description: Enhanced coverage for valuable homes and possessions
home.coverage_details: High dwelling limits, extended replacement cost, enhanced personal property

home.name: Elite Home Protection
home.description: Comprehensive coverage for luxury homes and valuables
home.coverage_details: Guaranteed replacement cost, high liability limits, scheduled personal property

life.name: Term Life Basic
life.description: Affordable term life insurance for essential needs

life.name: Term Life Plus
life.description: Enhanced term life with additional benefits
life.coverage_details: 10-30 year terms, death benefit, convertibility options

life.name: Whole Life Standard
life.description: Permanent life insurance with cash value accumulation
life.coverage_details: Lifetime coverage, guaranteed cash value growth, fixed premiums

life.name: Whole Life Premium
life.description: Premium permanent life insurance with enhanced benefits
life.coverage_details: Lifetime coverage, accelerated cash value, dividend options

health.name: Essential Care
health.description: Basic health coverage for preventative care and emergencies
health.coverage_details: Preventative care, emergency services, high deductible

health.name: Family Protection Plan
health.coverage_details: Comprehensive coverage with moderate deductibles, dental for children

health.name: Comprehensive Health
health.description: Robust health coverage for individuals and families
health.coverage_details: Low deductible, expanded network, prescription coverage, some dental and vision

health.name: Elite Health Coverage
health.description: Premium health coverage with maximum benefits
health.coverage_details: Lowest deductibles, nationwide network, comprehensive prescription, dental, and vision

discounts_available.name: multi-policy
discounts_available.description: Save up to 25% when bundling multiple policies
discounts_available.eligibility: Available to all customers with 2+ policies

discounts_available.name: safe driver
discounts_available.description: Save up to 30% for clean driving records
discounts_available.eligibility: No accidents or tickets in the past 3 years

discounts_available.name: good student
discounts_available.description: Save up to 15% for students with good grades
discounts_available.eligibility: Full-time students with 3.0 GPA or higher

discounts_available.name: military
discounts_available.description: Save up to 15% for active or retired military
discounts_available.eligibility: Active duty, veterans, and military families

discounts_available.name: homeowner
discounts_available.description: Save up to 5% on auto insurance for homeowners

discounts_available.name: paperless billing
discounts_available.description: Save 5% for enrolling in paperless billing

discounts_available.name: automatic payment
discounts_available.description: Save 5% when setting up automatic payments

discounts_available.name: safety features
discounts_available.description: Save up to 10% for vehicles with advanced safety features

discounts_available.name: loyalty
discounts_available.description: Save up to 20% after 5+ years with Acme

auto: How many vehicles do you need to insure?
What is the make, model, and year of your vehicle(s)?
How many drivers are in your household?
What's your driving history like over the past 3-5 years?
How many miles do you drive annually?
Do you use your vehicle for personal or business purposes?
Are you interested in basic liability or full comprehensive coverage?
Would you like to bundle this with any other insurance products?
home: What is the square footage of your home?
What type of home is it (single-family, condo, etc.)?
Do you have any security systems installed?
Have you made any recent renovations?
Do you have any features like a pool or trampoline?
Have you had any previous claims on your home?
life: Do you smoke or use tobacco products?
Do you have any pre-existing health conditions?
What is your desired coverage amount?
Are you interested in term life or whole life insurance?
How long do you need coverage for?
Do you want a policy that builds cash value over time?
health: Are you looking for individual or family coverage?
How many family members need to be covered?
Do you have any pre-existing conditions?
What level of coverage are you looking for?
Do you have any preferred healthcare providers?
How much can you afford for monthly premiums?
Do you need dental or vision coverage as well?
How often do you typically visit healthcare providers?

claim_process: Report the incident through our mobile app, website, or by calling 1-800-ACME-911
Provide necessary documentation including photos, police reports, and other relevant information
A dedicated claims adjuster will be assigned within 24 hours
Claim assessment with possible on-site inspection
Claim approval/denial decision typically within 5-7 business days
Payment processing within 48 hours of approval
Follow-up and feedback to ensure customer satisfaction

company_history.mission_statement: To provide peace of mind through innovative insurance solutions that protect what matters most to our customers

milestones.event: Founded as a small auto insurance provider in Silicon Valley
Expanded to offer home and life insurance products
Launched industry-first digital claims processing system
Introduced AI-powered risk assessment and customer service

trust_building_elements.guarantee: 30-day money-back guarantee on all new policies

proactive_conversation_starters: I noticed you're from California. Did you know we have special earthquake coverage options for California residents?
Many of our customers save over $500 by bundling their auto and home insurance. Would you like to explore bundle options?
Based on what you've shared, you might qualify for our safe driver discount. Can I tell you more about it?
With a family your size, our Family Protection Plan might be a perfect fit. Would you like to hear the details?
Have you considered umbrella insurance for additional liability protection beyond your standard policies?
Many homeowners don't realize their standard policy doesn't cover flooding. Would you like to learn about our flood insurance options?
I notice you haven't mentioned life insurance. Would you like me to explain how affordable term life coverage can be?
